resources.string:
Sedentary – little or no exercise
Lightly Active – light exercise (workout 1-3 days per week)
Moderately Active – moderate exercise (workout 3-5 days per week)
Very Active – hard exercise (workout 6-7 days per week)
Extremely Active – hard daily exercise (workout and physical job or 2 * day training)
BMI – Body Mass Index
BMR – Basal Metabolic Rate Duration – time in minutes HR – heart rate Ideal Heart Rate – target heart rate during exercise Maintenance Calories – daily calorie consumption to maintain current weight
